newsitem.title: CHINA: TENNIS-SOUTH KOREA BEAT CHINA IN DAVIS CUP TIE.
newsitem.headline: TENNIS-SOUTH KOREA BEAT CHINA IN DAVIS CUP TIE.

text.p: 3-0 lead over China after winning the doubles in their Davis Cup
Asia/Oceania zone group one second round tie on Saturday.
Yoon Yong-il/Lee Hyung-taik beat Pan Bing/Xia Jiaping
